title: Alistar e alistar skin
body:
Attempting to use the link to redeem the unchained Alistar only brings up a blank page. I have subscribed to the YouTube channel. But am unable to discover how to get skin through normal means. Please see the attached screenshot where I am signed in and subscribed to RiotGamesInc YouTube channel. And the second page where the http://youtube.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/youtube brings up a blank page. If unchained Alistar is no longer available I understand, and this ticket can be disregarded after I am notified of such. Otherwise can someone please direct me on how to resolve this issue?
Thank you EliaPoisoner

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=EliaPoisoner,realm=EUW,application-id=98NGV4Al,discussion-id=rOiy83Gn,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-09-09T07:52:29.155+0000)
>
> Attempting to use the link to redeem the unchained Alistar only brings up a blank page. I have subscribed to the YouTube channel. But am unable to discover how to get skin through normal means. Please see the attached screenshot where I am signed in and subscribed to RiotGamesInc YouTube channel. And the second page where the http://youtube.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/youtube brings up a blank page. If unchained Alistar is no longer available I understand, and this ticket can be disregarded after I am notified of such. Otherwise can someone please direct me on how to resolve this issue?
> Thank you EliaPoisoner

Hi, 

Bad news, Alistar skin, Tristana Skin and Garen skin aren't free anymore. You can try to submit a support ticket asking for these skins, hope it will help.

P.s this is the italian forum :P
Come posso chiedere il support ticket ?

> [{quoted}](name=EliaPoisoner,realm=EUW,application-id=98NGV4Al,discussion-id=rOiy83Gn,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-09-09T10:46:38.103+0000)
>
> Come posso chiedere il support ticket ?

At the top of the page, you can see the tab "Support", login on your account, and then click on "Submit a Ticket". Write about your problem and they will help you.
